about_the_game:
Dead Zone: Rebirth of Survivors is an FPS zombie-themed bullet hell game set in the Dead Zone universe. Fight against zombie hordes, improve your character with in-game improvements and skill tree training, and survive against bosses with various abilities. Kill and shred hordes of zombies! Gather skill points to improve your character. Use massive destruction guns to shred hordes of zombies!

GORE! GOREE! GOREEE!

Kill & Shred Hordes of Zombies

Use Massive Destruction Guns!

Such as a Rocket Launcher, Grenade Launcher, Frag Grenade, or Flamethrower.

Character Progression

  • Level up and get unique skills: Each time you get leveled up while slaying zombies, you will get three choices to get an upgrade! These upgrades can make you find some associates, such as a Helicopter (for lighting the area and bombing zombies) or a Turret.
  • Every time you die, you earn experience based on your performance of slaying zombies. These experience points will give you skill tree points. You will use those skills to unlock new skills(active skills such as Grenade Launcher), guns and attachments, and buffs(passive skills such as +%10 Maximum HP)

Boss Fight

Each map comes with a unique boss! Gather associates and improve your character to survive against hordes of zombies and the bosses!


More Info About Dead Zone Universe!


Dead Zone: Rebirth of Survivors is a bullet-hell game a part of the Dead Zone. DZ: RoS uses the base systems of Dead Zone. Dead Zone is an upcoming MMOFPS survival game that will be announced in Q3 2024. For more information, join our Discord server and ask anything you would like to know about DZ: RoS or Dead Zone.

name: Dead Zone: Rebirth of Survivors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD FX 6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780ti or AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K or Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060ti or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Dead Zone: Rebirth of Survivors is an FPS zombie-themed bullet hell game set in the Dead Zone universe. Use massive destruction guns to shred hordes of zombies! Improve your character with in-game improvements and skill tree training, and survive against bosses with various abilities.
